channel.title: Posts on Awesome Hugo blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Awesome Hugo blog

item.title: Hello World
item.description: I recently started to consider the option of having a tiny blog where I could be able to tell stories, and talk about what I want. So here we are! A new dawn Welcome! This website isn’t only a blog, but also the home of everything you need to find about me : my social media links, the projects I had over the time, and all the info and story of mine, which you can find in the About section.
